description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/02295/FUL (Demolition of existing industrial buildings and erection of Care Home (Class C2) comprising lower ground, ground and four upper floors, together with landscaping, amenity spaces, plant, off-street parking, cycle and waste storage and an electrical substation.) to allow reduction in lower ground floor space, re-arrange the internal layout at lower ground floor, re-design of fire escape, relocation of basement escape stair, external basement stair, relocation of the plant enclosure on the residence terrace on the third floor, changes in ensuite bedroom, amendment to internal layout, removal of external garden stairs from Resident Terrace and located towards the Cinema, increase in floor level, incorporation of winter garden at first and second floor, alteration to internal layout, insulation and construction tolerances to comply with current building standards and regulations.
decision_conditions: The application is submitted under Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. The Council considers the changes to both external appearance and  internal and external layout to be a material change to the original permission and as such, the S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.
